titleStmt.title: A lamentable ballad of little Musgrove, and the Lady Barnet To an excellent new tune.
Lamentable ballad of the little Musgrove, and the Lady Barnet.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for A. M[ilbourn] W. O[nley] and T[homas] Thackeray at the Angel in Duck-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "As it fell out on a high Holy-day,".
Date of publication suggested by Wing.
An edition of: A lamentable ballad of the little Musgrove, and the Lady Barnet.
Printed in four columns with woodcuts above text.
Copy cataloged has faded print affecting legibility of imprint and text.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
